name: Angel has fallen
description:
This Game was made for Vimjam2 with the requirement of "Boss" and the theme of "On the Edge". Its a 2d platformer with the goal of defeating the devil in hell. 

Controls:

A D to move

Space to jump

Leftclick to shoot

Thanks for playing, feedback would be appreciated.

Edit: If the controls are not functioning properly at the beginning, reload the game page.
